ygData.subject: Guiding on Rodcet
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, I recently finished my guide training for Rodcet Nife.  I m now an apprentice guide there.  One of the things they told us in training was...don t
ygData.messageBody:
Hi everyone,

I recently finished my guide training for Rodcet Nife. I'm now an
apprentice guide there. One of the things they told us in training
was...don't tell anyone you're a guide! Well it's a bit too late for that
hehee.

Unfortunately though I've learned I'm not allowed to handle petitions for
any of my friends. That's not that big a deal though really. I hope
you'll all say hi to me when you see me on =)

My guide character's name is Zute.

- Tina
